epics.title: E-Commerce Checkout
epics.description: Implement a checkout process with cart review, payment, and order confirmation.

epics.title: User Authentication
epics.description: Develop secure login, signup, and password reset functionalities.

epics.title: Product Catalog
epics.description: Allow users to browse, search, and filter products in the online catalog.

epics.title: Order Tracking
epics.description: Enable users to view their order status, shipment tracking, and history.
